actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 18 (2d10+7) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 14 (2d6+7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, 15 ft., one target, 16 (2d8+7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: All it picks within 120' and aware of it frightened 1 min (DC 17 Wis negates) Can re-save at end of each of its turns. Save/effect ends: immune 24 hrs.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Uses one of the following:Sand Blast. Exhales superheated sand in a 60' cone. Each creature in area: 27 (5d10) piercing damage and 27 (5d10) fire (DC 21 Dex half). If a creature fails its save by 5+ it suffers one level of exhaustion as it dehydrates.Blinding Sand. Breathes fine sand in a 60' cone. Each creature in area: blinded for 1 min (DC 21 Con negates). Blinded creature can take an action to clear its eyes of sand ending effect for it.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (2)
legendary_actions.desc: All within 15 feet: 14 (2d6+7) bludgeoning damage and knocked prone (DC 21 Wis negates). Can then fly up to half its fly speed.

special_abilities.name: Sand Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: Dex (Stealth) to hide in sandy terrain.

special_abilities.name: Sandy Nature
special_abilities.desc: Is infused with elemental power and it requires only half the air food and drink that a typical dragon if its size needs.

special_abilities.name: Stinging Sand
special_abilities.desc: 1st time it hits target with melee weapon attack target: disadvantage attacks/ability checks til its next turn ends (DC 21 Con).
